project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. The program should calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns provided by the user.

task.name: Implement the feature to read a CSV file and identify numerical columns.
Implement the calculation of the mean for the provided numerical columns.
Implement the calculation of the median for the provided numerical columns.
Implement the calculation of the mode for the provided numerical columns.
Write tests for the mean, median, and mode calculations.
Execute tests to ensure that the calculations for the mean, median, and mode function correctly.
